snippet: The United States reported stronger-than-expected labor and service sector data, but the Dow was hindered by Hewlett-Packard’s outlook report.
abstract: Stocks rise modestly on stronger-than-expected data on labor market and service sector, but Dow industrials are hobbled by slide in Hewlett-Packard.
lead_paragraph: The United States reported stronger-than-expected labor and service sector data, but the Dow was hindered by Hewlett-Packard’s outlook report.

headline.seo: Markets Close Modestly Higher on Labor Data
headline.main: Markets Close Slightly Higher on Labor Report
headline.print_headline: Markets Close Slightly Higher on Labor Report
